Text.Value: The Mapping will take place in the next chamber. Please, follow me.
We unburden people of the suffering in their hearts: melancholy, anger, self-doubt, troubling memories, and of course grief...
Please enter. The Mapping of the Heart will begin once you are seated.
You seem to think you know a lot about me.
Mother Superior has tasked me with bringing the proceeds of the collection box to her.
We have long awaited your return, sister. Please, do not delay. The Mother Superior awaits.
I cannot force you. But perhaps you can look inwards, and be true to yourself.
I desperately need help? What makes you say that?
Greetings once again. Perhaps you have had a change of heart? The Unburdening can provide succour to all.
Welcome again, my lady. Your victory over the apostate Viconia gladdens me - now we may have a true leader.
It can deceive, I must admit. Originally we sought to help those who found themselves consumed by the loss of a loved one, but there are so many others who need our help.
Before I came here, I was given to drunkeness, wanton violence, licentiousness of every sort... but now I am saved. As you can be.
You dare return, after all you did...? You should go and face the Mother Superior's judgement with dignity, if you're capable of such.
I can't afford to be unburdened of anything just now - especially gold.
Leave.
This smells like a scam.
*You sense a truth behind her words. She genuinely wants to help.*
*However, it seems truth is not the only thing behind her words. Something is being hidden.*
You may not like what you see, when you put yourself under scrutiny. But we can show you how to love yourself.
I just want to trade.
It... it seems the key has gone missing. My apologies to Mother Superior. I must have misplaced it.
Whatever ails the heart, whatever weighs upon the soul - we can help.
I know what happened down there - just leave me be. I don't want any trouble, not from you.
Usually a god would've been mentioned by now - is this a scam?
All right - I want to be unburdened.
*Her expression is a pure lack of intent - she is impossible to read.*
There is no need for violence. I understand that things have changed around here. I am no threat, I assure you.
That duty falls to me alone. I must assume you simply misheard her orders.
A pity. Perhaps you can find a way to correct that - better to have a light purse than a heavy heart.
The insight of an unburdened spirit. I too was once weighed down, but now I am free.
House of Grief? Quite a foreboding name...
Please, enter. The Mapping of the Heart requires utmost privacy. It will begin as soon as you are seated.
You... you are a sight to behold, sister. I feel the Dark Lady's blessings upon you. Please, the Mother Superior awaits.
We release people of the suffering in their hearts: melancholy, anger, self-doubt, troubling memories, and of course grief.
Welcome to the House of Grief. Are you here to be Unburdened?
There is the matter of the fee - a trifling sum compared to the peace we can grant you, rest assured. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
Of course, my lady. Here is the key - the collections box is right behind me.
Unburdened? What does that mean?
I can feel your struggle. Impulses you wrestle with. A certain... hunger. The Unburdening could spare you such woes.
I sense your anger - an ever-burning fire behind your eyes. Be unburdened. Let us quench the flames.
I sense a great, terrible power, weighing against your heart. It feels... dangerous, yet in your grasp. Let the Unburdening help you master that power.
I sense there are two sides to you, with no peace between them. The Unburdening can address that.
I sense shame, lies. You have not been honest - even to yourself. Let the Unburdening salve your soul.
I can feel how you crave connection, intimacy... the Unburdening can show a path to your heart's desires.
I feel how you are weighed down. Responsibility. The mistakes of the past. The concerns of the future. The Unburdening can ease all of these.
I sense a longing in you. You are not where you truly need to be - in body or spirit.
I feel betrayal weighing on your heart - but were you wronged, or are you the wrongdoer? Either way, you can be unburdened of such turmoil.
I feel a deadly righteousness burning in you. It threatens to consume all, unless you seek release.
I sense turmoil in you, even if you cannot bring yourself to admit it.

Wonderful, let the healing begin. First comes the Mapping of the Heart. You will be asked questions - it is important that you answer as truthfully as possible, so that we may know precisely what burdens you the most.
Of course - here is the key. The box is behind my station, as always.
I apologise my lady, the key to the collections box has gone missing.
Pay. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
A great deal of people in need have entered that door. In my time, I've come to recognise their suffering.
Give me your profits.
Admitting you have a problem is the first step - the hardest step. After that, we will be by your side.
I've changed my mind. Farewell.
Welcome, my lady. Your presence honours me.
...I think you could benefit from our help. In fact, I think you desperately need our help.
Incredible, that you even had the nerve to show up here. I have little else to say to the likes of you.

Synopsis: Serves as the front desk for the House of Grief. Encourages the player to partake of their services in exchange for a fee. Secretly a Sharran agent seeking to lure in the unwitting.
